amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decreases funding for the Community Development Fund to promote the identification and removal of barriers to affordable housing production and preservation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the community development block grant program by 50%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 324 (Roll no. 611).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 324 (Roll no. 611).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
